member.name: D2D1_LAYER_PARAMETERS
member.summary: Contains the content bounds, mask information, opacity settings, and other options for a layer resource.

member.name: D2D1_LAYER_PARAMETERS.contentBounds
member.summary: The content bounds of the layer. Content won't render outside these bounds.

member.name: D2D1_LAYER_PARAMETERS.geometricMask
member.summary: The geometric mask specifies the area of the layer that is composited into the render target.

member.name: D2D1_LAYER_PARAMETERS.maskAntialiasMode
member.summary: A value that specifies the antialiasing mode for the geometricMask.

member.name: D2D1_LAYER_PARAMETERS.maskTransform
member.summary: A value that specifies the transform that is applied to the geometric mask when composing the layer.

member.name: D2D1_LAYER_PARAMETERS.opacity
member.summary: An opacity value that is applied uniformly to all resources in the layer when compositing to the target.

member.name: D2D1_LAYER_PARAMETERS.opacityBrush
member.summary: A brush that is used to modify the opacity of the layer. The brush is mapped to the layer, and the alpha channel of each mapped brush pixel is multiplied against the corresponding layer pixel.

member.name: D2D1_LAYER_PARAMETERS.layerOptions
member.summary: A value that specifies whether the layer intends to render text with ClearType antialiasing.
